data.name: 0000 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After Tsuruya left us having business in the staffroom, the rest of us that Haruhi had...

data.name: 0001 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...been dragging around for the last two or so hours returned to the clubroom.

data.name: 0002 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, what's going on here?! We investigate it because we're told it's a ghost story...

data.name: 0003 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ...but it's all misunderstandings and people seeing things wrong!

data.name: 0004 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Good grief--Do they think I'm an idiot?!

data.name: 0005 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess having successive cases end in nothing has put Haruhi in a really bad mood.

data.name: 0006 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even now she's pacing around the clubroom like a gorilla that missed it's feeding.

data.name: 0007 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ahh jeez, what a disgrace! Mikuru, tea!

data.name: 0008 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-okay...!

data.name: 0009 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was preparing the tea, but she was rushed by Haruhi.

data.name: 0010 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She offered her a cup of tea in a panic.

data.name: 0012 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: *glug* *glug*!

data.name: 0013 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi drank the hot tea dry in two gulps.

data.name: 0014 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Does she have some kind of built in heat resistance inside her mouth?

data.name: 0015 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well then, I wonder what ghost story we should investigate next?

data.name: 0016 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Haruhi, you still feel like continuing?

data.name: 0017 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Her grumpy expression from mere moments ago is gone in an instant...

data.name: 0018 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...and now she looks like a cat, watching something dart around in front of her.

data.name: 0019 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That bad mood is surely at an altitude of around 33,000 feet by now...

data.name: 0020 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...and getting caught in turbulence. It doesn't need to worry about coming back.

data.name: 0021 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You say that, but whatever it is, it'll be a simple mistake again, right? Guaranteed.

data.name: 0022 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Personally, I'd be unbelievably pleased if it did turn out to be a mistake...

data.name: 0023 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm telling you--we won't know if it's a mistake or not unless we investigate it, right?

data.name: 0024 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We can't say for sure if at least one of them won't turn out to be real, can't we?

data.name: 0025 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Seems like Haruhi's still as motivated as ever.

data.name: 0026 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Good grief--Can't you use that motivation on something more meaningful?

data.name: 0027 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's almost evening, you know? In less than an hour the sun will set and it'll be pitch dark.

data.name: 0028 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You don't seriously plan to stay overnight in the school, do you?

data.name: 0029 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm always serious.

data.name: 0030 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And anway, the chance of ghost story encounters should be highest at night!

data.name: 0031 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So if anything, we're only just getting to the main event! So far was just an opening act.

data.name: 0032 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I understood what she was saying, but I didn't want to believe it...

data.name: 0034 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: B-but, we haven't arranged any sort of dinner…

data.name: 0035 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Surely you're not planning to power through this without any meals, right?

data.name: 0036 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Even I'm not that cruel. We'll at least arrange time to eat properly.

data.name: 0037 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Really? That's a relief.

data.name: 0038 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How about we use food breaks as an excuse to just go home?

data.name: 0039 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Yeah, that sounds good.

data.name: 0040 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi might not get so many weird ideas if she's on a full stomach.

data.name: 0041 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Do me a favor and go home and eat delicious food your heart's content.

data.name: 0042 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If we just buy convenience store bento boxes or something we'll be fine, right?

data.name: 0043 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It looks like it's not gonna be as easy as I was hoping.

data.name: 0044 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh, by the way--I just went to the library, and while I was there I got some info!

data.name: 0045 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Take a look! Here!

data.name: 0046 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What Haruhi was proudly brandishing was a worn out looking book.

data.name: 0047 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: What is this?

data.name: 0048 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Inside are pictures of the school area from before the war.

data.name: 0050 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A so-called "local resource," I see.

data.name: 0051 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And look, according to the book, it seems this area was air-raided heavily during the war.

data.name: 0052 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And it looks like the area where North High exists now was particularly severe.

data.name: 0054 (423.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hey, Kyon, what's an air raid?

data.name: 0055 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It means planes were dropping bombs all over the place.

data.name: 0056 (423.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Whaaat? That's terrible.

data.name: 0057 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, war is pretty terrible.

data.name: 0058 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But then again, we only know what we know about it.

data.name: 0059 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Next time we're in the countryside, go and ask your grandmother.

data.name: 0060 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm sure she could spend a whole night talking about it.

data.name: 0062 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Who cares about that?! What's important is this!

data.name: 0063 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What Haruhi shoved in my face this time was the cover of yet another worn-out book.

data.name: 0064 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's a work from the old literature club, right?

data.name: 0065 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's right. There're plenty of interesting stories in this book.

data.name: 0066 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi said so while flicking through the cheapishly bound book.

data.name: 0067 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't know who on earth wrote these, but why do they all seem like ghost stories…

data.name: 0068 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Was the literature club a group of occult-lovers back then?

data.name: 0069 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then, what sort of stories are there in the book?

data.name: 0070 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Let's see. For example--This.

data.name: 0071 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A teacher on night duty noticing the lights on in the gymnasium while patrolling.

data.name: 0072 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's one of the stories. Continuing it from the middle...

data.name: 0073 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They hear the sound of people talking and some sort of music reach their ears...

data.name: 0074 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Wondering if some sports club is still practicing, they take a look and…

data.name: 0075 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh my! There was no one inside!

data.name: 0077 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Hyaaaaah--?!

data.name: 0078 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It was all in that teacher's head, obviously.

data.name: 0079 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Or they'd been drinking on their night duty and were drunk. One of those.

data.name: 0080 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: There's also stuff like a bronze statue in the courtyard that cries tears of blood!

data.name: 0081 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0T-tears of blood--?!

data.name: 0082 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Our school doesn't have any sort of bronze statue.

data.name: 0083 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh, and this one's the real deal!

data.name: 0084 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If you buy juice in a cup from the vending machine in genkotsu square, every so often...

data.name: 0085 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The juice will come out before the cup!

data.name: 0086 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Hyaaaaa--?!

data.name: 0087 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see. That is rather frightening.

data.name: 0088 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …That's not even a ghost story anymore.

data.name: 0089 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You've just been annoying about every little thing for a while now, Kyon!

data.name: 0090 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't just deny everything--Show some motivation!

data.name: 0091 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How can you expect me to show motivation when you line up all those questionable stories?

data.name: 0092 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Do compose yourselves, the pair of you.

data.name: 0093 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We can't claim to understand the authenticity unless we actually take a look, can we?

data.name: 0094 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: How about we take a moment to ascertain these rumors?

data.name: 0095 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's right--It's exactly as Koizumi says.

data.name: 0096 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Since that's decided, let's go!

data.name: 0097 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Go? Go where?

data.name: 0098 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The gymnasium, of course! Isn't that obvious?!

data.name: 0101 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Set your sights for the gymnasium!

data.name: 0102 (423.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Gymnasium...!

data.name: 0103 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Okay everyone, let's get there without anyone falling behind.

data.name: 0106 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi headed to the gymnasium with a spring in her step, followed by my little sister.

data.name: 0107 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The rest of us are running after them of course, but…

data.name: 0108 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Koizumi.

data.name: 0109 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What might be the matter?

data.name: 0110 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you sure it's okay to encourage Haruhi like that?

data.name: 0111 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Seeing her like that, it seems like she's got high expectations about the gymnasium.

data.name: 0112 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. I assume it won't be a problem.

data.name: 0113 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It certainly seems like a big problem to me...

data.name: 0114 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Not even. In the first place, what do you suppose is necessary for a ghost story?

data.name: 0115 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh? What's this all of a sudden?

data.name: 0116 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, let me explain.

data.name: 0117 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Throughout all of known history, that which we call a ghost story must have an "origin."

data.name: 0118 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: An origin...?

data.name: 0119 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. An example would be a character who died with a grudge.

data.name: 0120 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Furthermore, an animal deified much like a fox or a cat also fits.

data.name: 0121 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Only when such a seed is planted is a ghost story born.

data.name: 0122 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: To "class 1-10" there was the class that shouldn't exist, the "man-eating classroom."

data.name: 0123 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: For the case of the music room, there was the legend of the ill-fortuned pianist…

data.name: 0124 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It is thought that only when Miss Suzumiya links such "origins" to the mystery...

data.name: 0125 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...that abnormal space is generated.

data.name: 0126 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I get the theory, but what's that got to do with this?

data.name: 0127 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Try to think back--about the ghost stories Miss Suzumiya was telling us earlier.

data.name: 0128 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: About the gymnasium and the bronze statue in the courtyard? Those?

data.name: 0129 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed. Neither are any more than a mere phenomenon, are they?

data.name: 0130 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In such a circumstance, Miss Suzumiya's powers will have a negligible influence.

data.name: 0131 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Such is a safe assumption, don't you think?

data.name: 0132 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The greater problem is as such--Preventing Miss Suzumiya's action in this very moment.

data.name: 0133 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As I mentioned earlier, her mental condition is far from ideal.

data.name: 0134 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If she gets stressed now and creates closed space, this will have all been for naught.

data.name: 0135 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In other words--Let her do as she likes for a while?

data.name: 0136 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Exactly that. I'd even like to provide her with amusements if we can.

data.name: 0137 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I get what Koizumi's saying.

data.name: 0138 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But, I can't rule out that he's taking an overly optimistic view.

data.name: 0139 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He says not to stress out Haruhi, but...

data.name: 0140 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...I sort of feel like dragging Haruhi out of the school would be better, even if by force.

data.name: 0141 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But then, if we do that and Haruhi breaks out into a genuine fit of rage―

data.name: 0142 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I can certainly feel my stomach dropping just thinking about it.

data.name: 0143 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Got it. Let's do as you say and just watch her for a while.

data.name: 0144 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If we can, it'd be best to get her thinking about other things.

data.name: 0145 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Yes indeed. It seems like have the margin to take that into consideration.

data.name: 0148 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Thank god... There are still sports clubs in the middle of practicing.

data.name: 0149 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There were sports clubs' members giving their all to their practice in the gymnasium.

data.name: 0150 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If you were to ask me, I's have to say it's a lot of enthusiasm for the summer holidays...

data.name: 0151 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Somehow it seemed like Haruhi had other thoughts.

data.name: 0152 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: With this many people here, there wouldn't have been any ghosts or anything.

data.name: 0153 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I wonder if the clubs won't just end right now?

data.name: 0154 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't be ridiculous.

data.name: 0155 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The sun may be setting, but it's a natural time for the sports clubs to be practicing.

data.name: 0156 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Guh... We've got no choice I guess. Well, on to the next one.

data.name: 0158 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Wherever we go, there's nothing! What on earth's going on, Kyon?!

data.name: 0159 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In this case, when she says there's nothing, she's talking about a bronze statue.

data.name: 0160 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Haven't I told you enough times by now? There's no bronze statue.

data.name: 0161 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There may have been one in the past, but now --as is evident--there's none to be found.

data.name: 0162 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It must've reached its compulsory retirement age long ago, now living off its pension.

data.name: 0163 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What a joke! How dare it disappear before we can solve the mystery?!

data.name: 0164 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: While it's a shame that the statue has gone...

data.name: 0165 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I suggest that the matter of the tears could most likely be explained as a misunderstanding.

data.name: 0166 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Throughout history, there are many tales of crying bronze statues, but...

data.name: 0167 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...in all cases, the culprit was always condensation.

data.name: 0168 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I expect this ghost story to most likely be a manifestation of the same phenomenon.

data.name: 0169 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But they went as far as to say "tears of blood," so I think it has to be a red liquid.

data.name: 0170 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Simple condensation would be transparent, right?

data.name: 0171 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Bronze rusts rather easily.

data.name: 0172 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Therefore, it is thought that when condensation mixes with the rust, it turns red.

data.name: 0173 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm…

data.name: 0174 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Even if that's true...

data.name: 0175 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: ...it's annoying that there's no statue when I want to check for myself.

data.name: 0176 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ahh, jeez. I've had enough of this statue! Next! Next!

data.name: 0177 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Dear me... Looks like I somehow managed to get out of that situation…

data.name: 0178 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? What do you mean?

data.name: 0179 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: The truth is, what I just said was a lie.

data.name: 0180 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A lie?

data.name: 0181 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: When bronze rusts, far from turning red, it turns blue.

data.name: 0182 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Things would've turned rather sour if Miss Suzumiya caught on to me.

data.name: 0183 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's surprisingly risky coming from you...

data.name: 0184 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, if the bronze statue were actually present, it certainly wouldn't have been enough.

data.name: 0185 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Either way, I'm just glad Haruhi gave up on it.

data.name: 0186 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let's see... Next up should be…

data.name: 0188 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I remember.

data.name: 0189 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The one about the juice coming out from the vending machine before the cup.

data.name: 0190 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I wonder which vending machine it is?

data.name: 0191 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As if it wasn't just some rumor you found...

data.name: 0192 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Perhaps it's that one?

data.name: 0193 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: On the vending machine Koizumi pointed at, if I'm not mistaken...

data.name: 0194 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...the words, #P05"Danger! Vending machine of terror!"#P01 were graffitied onto the machine.

data.name: 0196 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I can't believe someone would vandalize school property...

data.name: 0197 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: This school's morals have really gone down the drain, huh.

data.name: 0198 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Such words mean nothing coming from the embodiment of moral destruction herself.

data.name: 0199 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …You got a problem with that?

data.name: 0200 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not particularly.

data.name: 0201 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, buy juice from this vending machine.

data.name: 0202 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why me?

data.name: 0203 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Isn't that obvious? Because you're the lowest ranking member of the SOS Brigade.

data.name: 0204 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Since when did we have any sort of hierarchy like that now, hey...

data.name: 0205 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Since the formation of earth, of course?

data.name: 0206 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well if you've got that, hurry up and buy it!

data.name: 0207 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, yeah…

data.name: 0208 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While I grumbled, I took out some coins from my pocket and put them in the machine.

data.name: 0209 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Then as soon as the lights came on, a hand butted in from beside me and pressed a button.

data.name: 0210 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi, Haruhi! Don't just press buttons as you please!

data.name: 0211 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You were taking too long. Anyway, take a look.

data.name: 0212 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wha--?!

data.name: 0213 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I see, that's certainly…

data.name: 0214 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's certainly a "vending machine of terror," huh.

data.name: 0215 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Of all things... Yes, of all possible things...

data.name: 0216 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: When we put money in this machine and pressed a button…

data.name: 0217 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Juice poured with nothing to catch it, and then an empty cup dropped.

data.name: 0218 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What the heck is that?! Oi, Haruhi! Give me my money back!

data.name: 0219 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't complain to me, complain to the vending machine.

data.name: 0220 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Damn it... There goes 100 yen.

data.name: 0222 (423.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Poor Kyon... There there.

data.name: 0223 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, 100 yen to solve a mystery? Isn't that rather cheap?

data.name: 0224 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you think so then pay up.

data.name: 0226 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Exactly, it's good.

data.name: 0227 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Saying so, Haruhi put in a coin and suddenly pressed a button.

data.name: 0229 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: ...Hm? Where's my cup?

data.name: 0230 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It is yet within the vending machine.

data.name: 0231 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Naturally, the juice Haruhi bought poured into my cup and…

data.name: 0232 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Glug, glug, paaah! So cold and delicious!

data.name: 0233 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, that's my cup! You'd better pay the usage fee.

data.name: 0234 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I've already used it so who cares.

data.name: 0235 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What's with this outrageously oppressive attitude as if there's no one around to see it.

data.name: 0237 (423.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Hey, Kyon--I want juice too...

data.name: 0238 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Gotcha--Then I'll buy you one.

data.name: 0239 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Though, I'd rather not use this machine of terror. Let's go to the ones on the other side.

data.name: 0240 (423.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Yay! Juice, juice!

data.name: 0242 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi ran over to the machines opposite the cafeteria, followed by my sister.

data.name: 0243 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Huh? Now I think about it... Where're Asahina and Nagato?

data.name: 0244 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is something the matter?

data.name: 0245 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, Asahina and Nagato are... Ah, there they are.

data.name: 0249 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Maybe they're late because they stopped somewhere on the way here?

data.name: 0250 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato was her normal expressionless self, while Asahina looked pale for some reason.

data.name: 0251 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Both of them seemed a little off. Did something happen to them?

data.name: 0253 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Is something the matter? You don't look so well.

data.name: 0254 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0J-just now... o-on the other side...

data.name: 0255 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Please calm down. Take a deep slow breath and then... There, go ahead.

data.name: 0256 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Huuu... Haaah…

data.name: 0257 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: After single-mindedly breathing in and out, Asahina seemed to have calmed down a little.

data.name: 0258 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: O-over there... We saw a girl... She had long hair... It's not someone I know.

data.name: 0259 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: And then, right in front of my eyes... she gently disappeared…

data.name: 0260 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …The same as the girl I saw? Nagato, did you see her as well?

data.name: 0262 (423.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I didn't.

data.name: 0263 (423.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: However, a noticeable tremor was generated amongst the local data links.

data.name: 0264 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: B-but it was truly like a ghost…

data.name: 0265 (423.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The designation "ghost" is merely an idea based on specific preconceived notions.

data.name: 0266 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So what you're trying to say is that such a thing doesn't exist?

data.name: 0267 (423.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: No.

data.name: 0268 (423.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It can be assumed that its traits resemble that of what is generally known as a ghost.

data.name: 0270 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: So, it really is a ghost... Eeeek...

data.name: 0271 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina!

data.name: 0272 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As Asahina started to collapse, I hurriedly supported her shoulder.

data.name: 0273 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hang on, please! If Haruhi sees this things will get very complicated.

data.name: 0274 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hah, ah, th-that's right!

data.name: 0275 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Though, as the singularities develop, I fret it's only a matter of time before they're found.

data.name: 0276 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: At this rate, it'll probably be a risk letting Haruhi stay in the school.

data.name: 0277 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Indeed, I imagine there's only so much time before the game is up.

data.name: 0278 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Which would mean, our only choice is to change our way of doing things.

data.name: 0279 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: What do we do, Kyon?

data.name: 0280 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If we can, we should drag Haruhi out of the school.

data.name: 0281 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's right. As it stands, we can only play matters by ear.

data.name: 0282 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Holding Miss Suzumiya at the water's edge as she searches relentlessly for new wonders.

data.name: 0283 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I don't expect we can maintain this high-wire act forever.

data.name: 0284 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well that makes sense.

data.name: 0285 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Despite that, I suggest that dragging Miss Suzumiya out by force also presents danger.

data.name: 0286 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Then Koizumi, what do you suggest we actually do?

data.name: 0287 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I suggest we offer her recreation.

data.name: 0288 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Creating a situation that would grab Miss Suzumiya's interest more than the seven wonders.

data.name: 0289 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I see. Take advantage of Haruhi's low attention span.

data.name: 0290 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If something more interesting is happening, her interest will shift.

data.name: 0291 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Something that'd interest her more than the seven wonders right now though…

data.name: 0292 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'd like to do this as soon as we can.

data.name: 0293 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Even so...

data.name: 0294 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Umm... How about we all eat dinner together?

data.name: 0295 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Unfortunately, I don't imagine that will buy us any time.

data.name: 0296 (423.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I see…

data.name: 0297 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hold on, I'm not so sure about that.

data.name: 0298 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: My revelation was in some sense the most summer-like event possible.

data.name: 0301 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Barbecue? Huh, that's not a bad idea coming from you.

data.name: 0302 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As you can see, Haruhi jumped at the idea surprisingly easily.

data.name: 0303 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Are you okay, Kyon? Is something wrong with you?

data.name: 0304 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, since everyone's here and it's the summer vacation.

data.name: 0305 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There's no meaning to just getting convenience store bento, right?

data.name: 0306 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, I guess I can agree on that.

data.name: 0307 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But preparation starts now, right? What're we doing about ingredients and equipment?

data.name: 0308 (423.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, we'll sort something out, of course.

data.name: 0309 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I chose the more time consuming option, after all.

data.name: 0310 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But there's no way I can tell Haruhi that.

data.name: 0311 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Such efforts are part of the suggestion.

data.name: 0312 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In times like this, it's best to enjoy even the preparation, don't you think?

data.name: 0313 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: After all, if we're having a summer camp, we ought to have fun.

data.name: 0314 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi followed me up without a moment's notice.

data.name: 0315 (423.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: To also strengthen the bond of our SOS Brigade, what do you say, Miss Suzuimya?

data.name: 0316 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm, yeah…

data.name: 0317 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Personally, I'd like to complete the seven wonders as soon as possible, but…

data.name: 0318 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I have to value everyone else's opinion as well, right--as brigade chief?

data.name: 0319 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Try as she might to give a fair excuse, but the subtle curve in the corner of her mouth...

data.name: 0320 (423.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ...told us everything we needed to know--She was interested.

data.name: 0321 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Alright then. Let's do it! Barbecue!

data.name: 0322 (423.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If we're gonna do this, we might as well make it fun!

data.name: 0323 (423.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Test selection
